page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF-CHILD.
page.content:
{ A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KATHLEEN.
My typical day begins when I get up at 8.15. At 8.30 I have breakfast which is usually Cornflakes or Rice Krispies. Having dressed,at 8.55 my Dad drives me to school in the van, where I meet Cristle, my friend. We play games until the bell goes at 9.20 when morning lessons begin- Diary, Bible, Maths and English. Playtime is at 10.45 and lunchtime from 12.10 until 1.30. In canteen I help serve lunch to the infants. At 1.30 lessons begin again- Art, Gaelic, Craft etc. Afternoon break is at 2.50 till 3.05. I go home by bus at 4.oo,get changed into my play clothes and go out to play with my friend Catriona on P.6. I have my tea at 6.15. After tea I watch T.V. I go to bed at 9 00.
